sn48.70:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci supannanam rukkha, kutasimbali tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn48.70:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiya dhamma, pannindriyam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya.
sn48.70:1.4: Saddhindriyam, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati …pe… pannindriyam bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati.
sn48.70:1.5: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci supannanam rukkha, kutasimbali tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn48.70:1.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiya dhamma, pannindriyam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya”ti.
